imp.core.graphics

Class Material

  • java.lang.Object
    • imp.core.graphics.Material

  • public class Material
extends java.lang.Object
    This class acts as a data structure used to represent a material.
    Author:
    kuszewskij

      Returns the diffuse component of this material.

      Returns the name of this texture

      Sets the file path to the image used to texture this material.
      void setIsTextured(boolean b)
      sets whether or not this material should be drawn with a texture if it has one applied to it.

      Sets the shinyness value of this material.

    • Method Detail

      • getFilePathToTextureMap

        public java.lang.String getFilePathToTextureMap()
        Returns the file path to the texture map if this material is textured. returns null if it is not textured.
        Returns:

      • setFilePathToTextureMap

        public void setFilePathToTextureMap(java.lang.String filePathToTextureMap)
        Sets the file path to the image used to texture this material. Passing null will be treated as using no texture.
        Parameters:
        filePathToTextureMap -

      • isTextured

        public boolean isTextured()
        Returns true if the material is textured

        Returns:
        True if they are equal, false otherwise.
